about_the_game:
Confront Evil. Embrace the Darkness.

Episode One:
Step into the darkness of Tolyatti, a Soviet city haunted by corruption and despair. In *Fragments Of Tyranny*, you are Esmer Diakov—a man driven to madness by injustice, exacting revenge on those who prey on the helpless. With the guidance of his mentor and the backing of his stepbrothers, Esmer Diakov faces off against his deepest fears and darkest enemies.

Unique Inventory System

Manage items with Esmer Diakov's hauntingly interactive inventory system.

Features

  • Visceral Combat: Face your enemies with brutal efficiency as Esmer Diakov unleashes his rage through dark, merciless acts of justice.

  • Dark Storytelling: Explore a world where the boundaries of right and wrong are blurred, with an atmosphere thick with fear and suspense.

  • Haunting Atmosphere: Every shadow, every sound captures the eerie, foreboding energy of a Soviet city steeped in mystery and danger.

Minimum Requirements

Operating System: Windows 10 (64-bit)

CPU: Intel Core i5-10xxx or AMD Ryzen 5 3xxx

GPU: NVIDIA GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 570

RAM: 8 GB

Storage: 10 GB of available space

Gore-Filled Combat

Experience Esmer Diakov’s merciless fighting style in all its brutal intensity.

Screenshots

content_descriptors.notes: Full of bloods and violence against people

detailed_description:
Confront Evil. Embrace the Darkness.

Episode One:
Step into the darkness of Tolyatti, a Soviet city haunted by corruption and despair. In *Fragments Of Tyranny*, you are Esmer Diakov—a man driven to madness by injustice, exacting revenge on those who prey on the helpless. With the guidance of his mentor and the backing of his stepbrothers, Esmer Diakov faces off against his deepest fears and darkest enemies.

Unique Inventory System

Manage items with Esmer Diakov's hauntingly interactive inventory system.

Features

  • Visceral Combat: Face your enemies with brutal efficiency as Esmer Diakov unleashes his rage through dark, merciless acts of justice.

  • Dark Storytelling: Explore a world where the boundaries of right and wrong are blurred, with an atmosphere thick with fear and suspense.

  • Haunting Atmosphere: Every shadow, every sound captures the eerie, foreboding energy of a Soviet city steeped in mystery and danger.

Minimum Requirements

Operating System: Windows 10 (64-bit)

CPU: Intel Core i5-10xxx or AMD Ryzen 5 3xxx

GPU: NVIDIA GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 570

RAM: 8 GB

Storage: 10 GB of available space

Gore-Filled Combat

Experience Esmer Diakov’s merciless fighting style in all its brutal intensity.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (quad-core, 2.0 GHz) or Apple M1 (for basic compatibility with ARM-based Macs)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640 or better, or Apple M1 integrated graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11 Big Sur or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or M2, or Intel Core i7 (6-core or higher)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1/M2 GPU, or AMD Radeon Pro 5500M or equivalent

name: Fragments of Tyranny

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8xxx or AMD Ryzen 5 3xxx
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8xxx or AMD Ryzen 7 3xxx
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Fragments of Tyranny is a dark,action game set in the oppressive Soviet city of Tolyatti. Take on the role of Esmer Diakov, a man from diakov family who to slash the cruel people even if they are innocent
